metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1541 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap-based buffer overflow in the zip_read_mac_metadata function in archive_read_support_format_zip.c in libarchive before 3.2.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via crafted entry-size values in a ZIP archive.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1541` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.1').
